title: Form Validation Framework
description: Build a complete form validation framework with field types, custom validators, and cross-field validation similar to Django Forms.
instructions: Implement a Form class that supports multiple field types, custom validation methods, and displays errors properly.

hints.text: **Hint:** In `is_valid()`, first call `to_python()` to convert the value, then call `validate()` to check constraints. Use `getattr(self, f'clean_{name}', None)` to find custom clean methods. Wrap everything in try/except to catch ValidationError.

commonMistakes.consequence: Attackers bypass validation by disabling JavaScript
commonMistakes.correction: Always validate on the server side - client-side validation is for UX only
